column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Evelyn B. Byrne]]'''
column3: on the occasion of her work that resulted in ''[[Attacks of Taste]]''.

column1: *'''Publication:''' A small fragment was published in ''[[Attacks of Taste]]''. A longer excerpt was published in ''[[Sotheby's The James S. Copley Library 17 June 2010]]''.

Teenage is a long period and there is a vast gap between one's thirteenth birthday and one's twentieth. I can name no book that influenced me deeply as a book. I found certain elements in books that I liked and stored away in memory. … In the early part of this period things I read with most pleasure were mostly scientific in reference, especially botany and astronomy …<ref>[http://www.sothebys.com/app/ecatalogue/fhtml/index.jsp?event_id=30210#/r=index-fhtml.jsp?event_id=30210|r.main=lot.jsp?event_id=30210&id=269|r.overlay=catalogue_notes.jsp?event_id=30210&id=269/ Sothebys.com]
